name: Mother's ashes
description:
Your mother has passed away and her last wish is for you to take her ashes to "The top" of a structure

What's on the structure is unknown
so you embark on a journey to deliver you Mother's Ashes

This is a short 3d platformer adventure game
It is a bit clunky and sometimes buggy
and I have no intentions on continuing to work on this game for now
However I will make this project open source
The project uses unreal engine 4.27
Repo: https://github.com/Shadowhawk69420/Mother-s-ashes
